data: The note "Authentication API Specification" describes an API for managing user authentication.
The note "Authentication API Specification" defines two API endpoints: POST /api/login and POST /api/logout.
The note "Authentication API Specification" specifies that successful authentication returns HTTP status code 200 with the message "OK."
The note "Authentication API Specification" specifies that failed authentication returns HTTP status code 401 with the message "Unauthorized."
The note "Authentication API Specification" provides a technical outline of authentication API endpoints.
The note "Authentication API Specification" focuses on authentication functionality in a technical API context.
